greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of primes of form 4n+3 (1 if n is prime of form 4n+3, 0 otherwise).
comment: Let M(n) denote the n X n matrix m(i,j)=0 if n divides ij-1, m(i,j) = 1 otherwise then det(M(n))=+1 if and only if n is prime ==3 (mod 4).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Feb 04 2003
